entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
